trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_SEQ_00<tab>The Dotharli youth is looking for someone to protect her.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Dotharli youth.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Dotharli youth and slay any enemies that appear.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Dotharli youth.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the Dotharli youth and slay any enemies that appear.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the Dotharli youth.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the Dotharli youth.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_TODO_06<tab>Deliver the letter to Maral.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_000<tab>Hello there, traveler. I would appreciate your help, should you have the time.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_001<tab>However, I would prefer to discuss it somewhere free from prying eyes. Meet me in front of the Dusk Throne.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_010<tab>Thank you for coming. I wish to go to meet with Nhaama. But the road to her is fraught with peril. As such, I need someone to protect me.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_011<tab>It was only a few weeks ago that both my mother and father were taken from me by the heartless Oronir.

TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_012<tab>Their deaths made me realize that I must commune with the Dusk Mother. I shall pray that she strike down those who pretend they are the children of Azim, and that she continue to nurture the Dotharl.

TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_013<tab>Nhaama resides in the House of the Crooked Coin to the north. I have heard many tales recently of pilgrims being slain by the monsters that lie in wait along the trail.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_014<tab>The same must not happen to me. Please, be on your guard. Rendezvous with me further to the north.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_020<tab>The Dusk Mother awaits. Let us make haste.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_021<tab>It seems the tales I heard were true. Dispatch them swiftly!
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_022<tab>Thank you. Let us resume the climb.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_030<tab>More beasts. There is no other way to reach Nhaama. We must not falter!
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_040<tab>We are close now. So very close...
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_050<tab>Thank you for seeing me here safely. There is one last thing I would request of you.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_051<tab>Deliver this to a girl in Dotharl Khaa named Maral.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_FANATIC02790_000_052<tab>Now, please leave me to be alone with the Dusk Mother.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_MARAL_000_060<tab>Is there something you wish to say to me?
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_MARAL_000_061<tab>A letter? But, why?
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_MARAL_000_062<tab>So she has gone to be one with the Dusk Mother. I have no doubt it is what she wanted, but that knowledge does naught to alleviate the pain in my heart.

TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_MARAL_000_063<tab>The House contains a crystal─a sliver of Nhaama's essence. Those who wish to rejoin with the Dusk Mother throw themselves down into the cavern there. This breaks the cycle of reincarnation.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_MARAL_000_064<tab>The Dusk Mother has always been at the center of my friend's life. The same was true of her previous incarnations.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_MARAL_000_065<tab>To think, if she had been killed together with her family, her spirit could have moved into the child my sister is about to birth...
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_MARAL_000_066<tab>Forget what I just said. I did not mean it. We should take solace in the knowledge that she is finally at peace.
TEXT_STMBDZ612_02790_MARAL_000_067<tab>The envelope her letter came in also contained what seems to be your compensation for helping her. Please accept it as a token of her gratitude.
